other_title: 銀河機攻隊 マジェスティックプリンス
opening_theme: #1: "Watashi wa Souzousuru (私は想像する)" by Natsumi Kon (eps 2-12)
ending_theme: #1: "Sayonara tte Iu (サヨナラっていう)" by Chiaki Ishikawa (eps 1-12)

#3: "Bokutachi wa Ikiteiru (僕たちは生きている)" by Izuru Hitachi (Hiroki Aiba), Toshikaze Asagi (Shintaro Asanuma), Ataru Suruga (Junya Ikeda) (ep 16, 21-22)
#5: "Kokoro wa Hitotsu ja nai (心はひとつじゃない)" by Natsume Kon (ep 20)
#6: "Watashi wa Souzousuru (私は想像する)" by Natsumi Kon (ep 24)
